import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' const ItemForm = ({ defaultValues, onFormSubmit }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm({ defaultValues }) const onSubmit = handleSubmit((data) => { onFormSubmit(data) console.log(data) }) return (
{errors.title && Title is required} {errors.userId && An userId is required}
) } export default ItemForm
